Tim was panting hard and he was soaked in sweat as the couch blowed his whistle. He slowed down his pace before stopping to avoid getting dizzy. Then he let himself fall over and laid on the ground wheezing. It was the final gym lesson of high school, his last gym lesson ever, and this day also marked the end of his last diet. his third this year. He pulled himself up and followed the others into the locker rooms.
In the shower Tim looked at his classmates. Muscular chests, abs, beefy arms, the whole package on most of them, some were lean and scrawny and a few was chubby. Tim was the only one who could be called fat. He looked down at his big round belly and sagging moobs and thought about the chubby tights that were beneath them. He hated his body. All it did was slowing him down. He had tried to loose weight several times, but always gained back what he lost, if he lost anything at all. He was not sure why he was so fat. He had been fat as long as he could remember, making it hard to know what caused it in the first place. But he knew his lazy primary school years had helped. At least noone made fun of him anymore. After he got dressed it was time for math, then the it was home to study for the upcomming exam and to see if his diet had worked.
For the past 3 weeks he had been excersising regulary, attended all of the football trainings he loathed, not eaten any candy and only had two servings at dinner, against his usual 3 and a half. He had always been a big eater, but Tim thought that, if he felt hungry, he was hungry, and therby could eat more.

The day was over and Tim was on his way home. As part of his diet he walked the two kilometers instead of taking the buss. Despite the whole way beeing flat he always felt tired when he made it home. The first thing he did was locking himself in the bathroom, take of all his clothes and step on the scale. He had been 251 lbs when he began 3 weeks ago, and the diet promised a 4 pound loss a week. The numbers flashed before ending at 250 lbs. Tim made an annoyed groan and stepped off. Down 1 pound after three weeks dieting. He hated diets and he hated exercise, but he hated his belly to, but this was it. He would not take it anymore. He had tried more than 20 diets the past 5 years and never dropped more than 10 pounds (which came back quick). He was sick of struggeling on the football field, of eating salad with no dressing, of having to explain to his friends why he never joined them for McDonalds. This was it. Screw diets, if they didn't work anyway he might just as well start enjoying life like this.
He went to his room and collected all his dieting books and threw them away, then he opened a bag of chips, the first he had eaten in more than a month and went to watch TV.
After about an hour he gets tired of Simpson reruns and heads to his room to study. He brings a bottle of soda.
At dinner that day he takes 4 servings and eats dessert for the first time in 6 months. His parents, knowing how sensitive he is about weight doesn't mention it, but notes how much Tim is scarfing down. After dinner Tim...

1111.content:
Beads of sweat formed on Tim's face as he sat on one of the stairs leading up to the top of the waterslide. His heart raced due to the sheer effort it took for haul his 250+ pound body up those stairs again and again and again. He needed a moment to catch his breath and gestured to Carl to go on without him. The smaller boy walked past him.

While he recovered, something caught Tim's eye. Not too far away was a separate pool for those wanting to swim laps. It was typically occupied by svelte boys and girls who swam through the water as if they were birds gliding through air.

But under the waves, Tim spotted the figure of an utterly massive person. Even from a distance and obscured by the water currents, he could tell that whoever was swimming in that designated lane was pretty big, perhaps as even wide as the lane itself.

Tim watched as the figure slowly yet consistently moved under the water, crawl a few feet then pop up to take a large gasp of air before plunging down again. It must have taken at least ten minutes to do just one lap.

The large swimmer then went over to the pool's ladder and pulled himself out. That's was when Tim got a good look at the guy. He guessed the swimmer was around Tim's age and probably the same height, but the swimmer was much, much heavier than Tim. A belly nearly the size of a beach ball with two fatty slabs for moobs resting on top with nipples stretched to the size of silver dollars, love handles that seemed to reach totally around his back, tree trunk thighs, and a butt that looked like two basketballs shoved into what had to be the largest red Speedo Tim ever saw. Were Tim closer, he would have noticed faded stretch marks around the swimmer's bellybutton, nipples, upper arms, and thighs. The mammoth of a boy plodded to a nearby chair where he began towelling off, starting with his mop of unkempt brown hair and working his way down, being sure dry off his folds of fat as well.

Drying off the best he could (Tim noticed he wasn't able to reach too far past his enormous belly), the swimmer wrapped the cartoonishly large towel around his waist and waddled in the direction of the locker room, his flab wobbling as he waddled away.

Tim was in awe and intrigued by the boy. Here he was, hovering around 250 pounds and barely able to get up a flight of stairs. Yet that guy, who probably around 400 pounds, was doing laps and hardly looked winded afterwards.

Luckily, the obese swimmer hadn't left his phone long enough for the password protection to activate, so Tim was free to snoop.

The phone's home screen was filled with various apps. Some of them were popular mobile games, a few of them were utility apps, but it was CaloCount that caught Tim's eye. It was a popular calorie counting app known for its easy user interface and vast library of nutrionial information. In fact, Tim had used it back when he was dieting and, while he personally didn't have any weight loss success, he had to admit that it was a pretty handy tool.

Tim tapped on the icon and the app loaded up. "Retrieving Ethan's profile", he screen said.

"Alright, his name is Ethan," said Tim. "So let's see if he's lost any wei-....woah."

Tim took a few minutes to scan Ethan's profile history on CaloCount. It recorded him as having started his profile four months ago and logged in a weight of 313 pounds and displayed a chart noting all his other weight entries. But whereas most people would post losses, Ethan was posting gains. Big gains, in fact. The last weight entry was from five days ago where he entered his weight at 387.

"God damn," Tim muttered to himself. "Over seventy pounds in a few months..." He then clicked open a tab that displayed a list of his daily calorie intake. Scrolling through them, Tim didn't see a day where Ethan ate less than ten thousand calories. And there were a few days where he got pretty close to thirty thousand calories.

"Ha ha! Hey, these's yours?"

Tim spun around in shock having not heard anyone enter the locker room. Standing there was one of the young jocks he saw running around swimming pool earlier today. He was holding up the oversize Speedo.

"Umm, no," Tim sputtered as he placed the phone back into the locker and shutting it closed. "But they belong to-"

"Woah! They belong to a fat ass, that's who!" The boy had stretch out the Speedo as far as it could go. Tim judged that the jock and one of his friends could easily fit in them. "Wait, do these belong to that hippo? Oh man, I'm going to show these to my friends! They are going to laugh their asses off!"

The jock turned and ran out the door. "Hey! Those aren't yours!" yelled Tim.

Ethan pulled out his phone and asked for Tim's number which he put into his contacts. "Cool. I just texted you, so you have my number now. I need to hit the showers and take off pretty soon, but let's hang out!"

Ethan sat on the sofa in his living wearing only a pair of absurdly large silky purple boxers that hung loosely to his body. His enormous belly took up well over half of his lap as it churned away at digesting the gigantic meal he had eaten not long ago. The obese swimmer's tent-like shirt and sweatpants lay in a crumpled heap on the living room floor.

But then he remembers that he had seen much more of Ethan at the swimming pool and wasn't too weirded out. Soon thereafter, Tim's jeans and shirt were on the floor next to Ethan's clothes.

Tim sat at the opposite end of the couch, lazily rubbing a hand over his painfully stuffed belly clad only in his black briefs. His belly, normally flabby and jiggly, was taunt and round and made Tim look several months pregnant.

The two boys watched television quietly, the silence only broken up by the occasional burp or the groaning of one of their bellies. After a couple of hours of this, an alarm on Ethan's phone went off. He heaved his blob-like body and reached for the phone on the coffee table to dismiss the alarm.

"Be right back!" Ethan said as he waddled into the apartment kitchen. Tim continued watching television but was distracted by the loud whirring of a blender. He pulled himself off of the couch and walked to the kitchen to see what Ethan was up to, his gut swaying as he moved.

Ethan pulsed the blender as it whipped together its thick, light brown contents. Tim surmised it might be similar to the shake he saw Ethan drinking in the locker room the day before. The pitcher was filled to the absolute brim as the swimmer blended the concoction. On the counter was a jug of whole milk, a carton of heavy cream, a bottle of chocolate syrup, and two large tubs. One of the tubs was a generic whey protein, and the other, Tim read, was something called BulkBlaster 3XT.

"Whatcha making there?" Tim asked.

"Oh, uh, it's a kind of nutritional shake," Ethan replied. "Burgers and fries don't give you all the vitamins you need!" He then pulled the lid off of the blender's pitcher and stuck a fat digit in, licking his finger off. "Hmm, there we go. I think it's done." Taking the pitcher off of the blender's base, he raised it to his mouth and started drinking. Tim watched in awe as Ethan chugged the entire mixture in the pitcher only stopping to take a couple of deep breaths before going back to drinking. A small trickle of the substance ran down the swimmer's cheek as he drank. It dripped down from his double chin and landed his his flabby chest. Creaks and groans were audible from Ethan's belly which was already straining from dinner. Ethan's eyes winched in pain as he was nearing the end. He slammed down the pitcher onto the counter when he had emptied it. A pained expression was on his face.

"Are...are you okay?" asked Tim. Tim held up a finger indicating that he needed a moment. The rotund boy leaned against the counter, silent and with eyes shut hard.

"....OUCH," Ethan bellowed a minute later. "Brain freeze! Ugh, I've got to remember to slow down." He licked off the shake that remained on his upper lip and wiped his chest off with his hand.

"Damn, I thought you were going to explode for a minute there!" said Tim.

"Nah, this belly can handle it." Ethan patted his gut which was considerably more swollen than it was minutes ago. "I usually do this every night before bed. Been doing it for a few months now." Tim imagine ingesting all those calories before bed, each one being converted into fat, practically inflating him during the night.

"Yeah, uh, I bet," said Tim. "I mean, it looks and smells good!"

"It does!" Ethan replied. "You want one? I mean, not a whole pitcher. You're not ready for that...yet." The swimmer smirked.

Tim was interested in trying some of that extremely caloric shake. But his poor belly was still trying to digest dinner and he was sure it could handle much more in it.

"Uh huh, and how many pounds of water?"

"Umm, 30, I think?"

"It's a long story," began Carl. "It happened wh-"

Each of them were ripped with clearly defined six-pack abs and swollen pecs. They too only had a towel around their waist. Yet one could easily make out bludging quads and thick glutes underneath.

The three boys were carrying on their conversation about wrestling practice as they sat on bench on the opposite side of Carl and Tim. One of them glanced over to the two overweight boys, and Carl gave him a nod of acknowledgement all the while trying not to blush in front of the physical specimens in their presence.

Tim started to feel self-conscious. He and Carl were nearly nude, their flab and pudge on display. Easily, both friends weighted more than all three of the hunks combined, and Tim wouldn't be surprised if he had more body fat than all them total.
